numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In each major sport, the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of coaches of color.
2. In baseball, the percentage of individuals of color on the team is the lowest.
3. I wonder why people of color are not hired for higher positions in the sports industry.
4. One possible reason is that these people are coincidentally not qualified enough.
6. This graph suggests that people of color from my generation can play sports without feeling left out.
7. This graph suggests that people of color from my generation can play sports without feeling underrepresented.
8. The coaches' data shows less diversity than the player data.
9. This situation could discourage individuals of color.
10. This situation could suggest that it is not possible for an individual of color to accomplish more than playing the sport.
11. The headline is: Is diversity balanced between coaches and players?
